verses.verse: And he said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> There was a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a steward; <S%G3623><s%> and the same <S%G3778><s%> was accused <S%G1225><s%> to him that he had wasted <S%G1287><s%> his goods. <S%G5224><s%>

And he called <S%G5455><s%> him, and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, How <S%G5101><s%> is it that I hear <S%G191><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> of you? give <S%G591><s%> an account <S%G3056><s%> of your stewardship; <S%G3622><s%> for you may <S%G1410><s%> be no <S%G3756><s%> longer <S%G2089><s%> steward. <S%G3621><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> the steward <S%G3622><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall I do? <S%G4160><s%> for my lord <S%G2962><s%> takes <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> from me the stewardship: <S%G3622><s%> I cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2480><s%> dig; <S%G4626><s%> to beg <S%G1871><s%> I am ashamed. <S%G153><s%>

I am resolved <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> to do, <S%G4160><s%> that, when <S%G3752><s%> I am put <S%G3179><s%> out of the stewardship, <S%G3622><s%> they may receive <S%G1209><s%> me into <S%G1519><s%> their houses. <S%G3624><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his lord's <S%G2962><s%> debtors <S%G5533><s%> to him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to the first, <S%G4413><s%> How <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> owe <S%G3784><s%> you to my lord? <S%G2962><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> An hundred <S%G1540><s%> measures <S%G943><s%> of oil. <S%G1637><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Take <S%G1209><s%> your bill, <S%G1121><s%> and sit <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> quickly, <S%G5030><s%> and write <S%G1125><s%> fifty. <S%G4004><s%>

Then <S%G1899><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> he to another, <S%G2087><s%> And how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> owe <S%G3784><s%> you? And he said, <S%G2036><s%> An hundred <S%G1540><s%> measures <S%G2884><s%> of wheat. <S%G4621><s%> And he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Take <S%G1209><s%> your bill, <S%G1121><s%> and write <S%G1125><s%> fourscore. <S%G3589><s%>

And the lord <S%G2962><s%> commended <S%G1867><s%> the unjust <S%G93><s%> steward, <S%G3622><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he had done <S%G4160><s%> wisely: <S%G5430><s%> for the children <S%G5207><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> are in their generation <S%G1074><s%> wiser <S%G5429><s%> than <S%G5228><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

And I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Make <S%G4160><s%> to yourselves <S%G1438><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%> of the mammon <S%G3126><s%> of unrighteousness; <S%G93><s%> that, when <S%G3752><s%> you fail, <S%G1587><s%> they may receive <S%G1209><s%> you into <S%G1519><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> habitations. <S%G4633><s%>

He that is faithful <S%G4103><s%> in that which is least <S%G1646><s%> is faithful <S%G4103><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in much: <S%G4183><s%> and he that is unjust <S%G94><s%> in the least <S%G1646><s%> is unjust <S%G94><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> in much. <S%G4183><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you have not been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in the unrighteous <S%G94><s%> mammon, <S%G3126><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> will commit <S%G4100><s%> to your <S%G5213><s%> trust <S%G4100><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> riches?

And if <S%G1487><s%> you have not been <S%G1096><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in that which is another <S%G245><s%> man's, <S%G245><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> you that which is your <S%G5212><s%> own?

No <S%G3762><s%> servant <S%G3610><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> masters: <S%G2962><s%> for either <S%G2228><s%> he will hate <S%G3404><s%> the one, <S%G1520><s%> and love <S%G25><s%> the other; <S%G2087><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else he will hold <S%G472><s%> to the one, <S%G1520><s%> and despise <S%G2706><s%> the other. <S%G2087><s%> You cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and mammon. <S%G3126><s%>
And the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> who were covetous, <S%G5366><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things: and they derided <S%G1592><s%> him.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, You are they which <S%G3588><s%> justify <S%G1344><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> men; <S%G444><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts: <S%G2588><s%> for that which is highly <S%G5308><s%> esteemed among <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%> is abomination <S%G946><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

The law <S%G3551><s%> and the prophets <S%G4396><s%> were until <S%G2193><s%> John: <S%G2491><s%> since <S%G575><s%> that time <S%G5119><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is preached, <S%G2097><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> man presses <S%G971><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it.

And it is easier <S%G2123><s%> for heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> to pass, <S%G3928><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> pronunciation mark <S%G2762><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> to fail. <S%G4098><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> puts <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> his wife, <S%G1135><s%> and marries <S%G1060><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> commits <S%G3431><s%> adultery: <S%G3431><s%> and whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> marries <S%G1060><s%> her that is put <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> from her husband <S%G435><s%> commits <S%G3431><s%> adultery. <S%G3431><s%>

There was a certain <S%G5100><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> which <S%G2532><s%> was clothed <S%G1737><s%> in purple <S%G4209><s%> and fine linen, <S%G1040><s%> and fared <S%G2165><s%> sumptuously <S%G2988><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> day: <S%G2250><s%>

And there was a certain <S%G5100><s%> beggar <S%G4434><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> was laid <S%G906><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> his gate, <S%G4440><s%> full of sores, <S%G1669><s%>

And desiring <S%G1937><s%> to be fed <S%G5526><s%> with the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> from the rich <S%G4145><s%> man's table: <S%G5132><s%> moreover <S%G235><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the dogs <S%G2965><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and licked <S%G621><s%> his sores. <S%G1668><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that the beggar <S%G4434><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> and was carried <S%G667><s%> by the angels <S%G32><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Abraham's <S%G11><s%> bosom: <S%G2859><s%> the rich <S%G4145><s%> man also <S%G2532><s%> died, <S%G599><s%> and was buried; <S%G2290><s%>

And in hell <S%G86><s%> he lift <S%G1869><s%> up his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> being <S%G5225><s%> in torments, <S%G931><s%> and sees <S%G3708><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> afar <S%G3113><s%> off, <S%G575><s%> and Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> in his bosom. <S%G2859><s%>

And he cried <S%G5455><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me, and send <S%G3992><s%> Lazarus, <S%G2976><s%> that he may dip <S%G911><s%> the tip <S%G206><s%> of his finger <S%G1147><s%> in water, <S%G5204><s%> and cool <S%G2711><s%> my tongue; <S%G1100><s%> for I am tormented <S%G3600><s%> in this <S%G5026><s%> flame. <S%G5395><s%>

But Abraham <S%G11><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Son, <S%G5043><s%> remember <S%G3415><s%> that you in your lifetime <S%G2222><s%> received <S%G618><s%> your good <S%G18><s%> things, and likewise <S%G3668><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> things: but now <S%G3568><s%> he is comforted, <S%G3870><s%> and you are tormented. <S%G3600><s%>

And beside <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> this, <S%G5125><s%> between <S%G3342><s%> us and you there is a great <S%G3173><s%> gulf <S%G5490><s%> fixed: <S%G4741><s%> so <S%G3704><s%> that they which would <S%G2309><s%> pass <S%G1224><s%> from hence <S%G1782><s%> to you cannot; <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1410><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> they pass <S%G1276><s%> to us, that would come from there. <S%G1564><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> I pray <S%G2065><s%> you therefore, <S%G3767><s%> father, <S%G3962><s%> that you would send <S%G3992><s%> him to my father's <S%G3962><s%> house: <S%G3624><s%>

For I have <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> brothers; <S%G80><s%> that he may testify <S%G1263><s%> to them, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they also <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> of torment. <S%G931><s%>
Abraham <S%G11><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, They have <S%G2192><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> and the prophets; <S%G4396><s%> let them hear <S%G191><s%> them.

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> No, <S%G3780><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> Abraham: <S%G11><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to them from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> they will repent. <S%G3340><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, If <S%G1487><s%> they hear <S%G191><s%> not Moses <S%G3475><s%> and the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will they be persuaded, <S%G3982><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
